definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Zuo4 jia1 Xie2 hui4

definition: the League of the Left-Wing Writers, an organization of writers formed in China in 1930
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Zuo3 yi4 Zuo4 jia1 Lian2 meng2

sentences.english: All these writers run to sentiment.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些作家都有伤感的倾向。

sentences.english: I also love classical literature, and Cao Xueqin is one of my favorite authors.
sentences.chinese: 我还喜欢古典文学，曹雪芹是我最喜欢的作家之一。

sentences.english: He can't say why he decided to become a writer.
sentences.chinese: 他也说不清楚自已是何时决定要当作家的。

sentences.english: Do we require of our writers to fight the system?
sentences.chinese: 我们要求我们的作家去和体制抗争么？

sentences.english: The other thing to realize is that all writers think they suck.
sentences.chinese: 另外一个要认识的事情是所有作家认为他们有所得。

sentences.english: As it is I have been forced into becoming a sort of pamphleteer.
sentences.chinese: 事实是，我被迫成了一名写小册子的作家。

sentences.english: Kelli Kirk is a writer, baker, mom and human resources manager.
sentences.chinese: 凯利柯克是一位作家，面包师，妈妈和人力资源经理。

sentences.english: Li Yu and Aina Jushi is the best writer In the short vernacular fiction novel writing In the Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 李渔和艾衲居士是清代最出色的短篇白话小说作家。

sentences.english: The young author burned energy as if he never heard of resting.
sentences.chinese: 这位青年作家耗费精力，似乎从未听说过休息。

sentences.english: Come writers and critics. Who prophesize with your pen.
sentences.chinese: 来吧，预言以笔的作家，批评家们。

sentences.english: He became acquainted with many well-known writers during her short stay there.
sentences.chinese: 她在那短暂逗留期间结识了许多名作家。

sentences.english: How do you feel when you think of all the competing writers within the African-American contemporary novel industry?
sentences.chinese: 当想到当代非美小说界所有竞争作家时你是怎样想的？

sentences.english: I'm sure a writer… for two years.
sentences.chinese: 我确信什么也无法阻止李蕾成为一名作家。

sentences.english: The Ci poem writer Han Yuanji and his son Han Biao were effective litterateurs at Song dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 韩元吉和韩淲是南宋词坛的一对父子作家。

sentences.english: Li Xian-qiao was a representative writer of GaoMi Poetic School in Qin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 李宪乔是清代高密诗派的代表性作家。

definition: School of Minor-talks, one of the Hundred Schools of Thought 諸子百家|诸子百家[zhu1 zi3 bai3 jia1] during the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
